UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile with their preferences and information.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity, matches Firebase Auth UID.

fullName.description: The user's full name from onboarding.

onboardingComplete.description: Flag indicating if the user has completed the onboarding process.

currentEducation.description: The user's current level of education.

targetDegree.description: The degree the user is aiming for.

fieldInterest.description: The user's fields of study interest.

budgetRangeUSD.description: The user's annual budget range for tuition in USD.

englishOnly.description: Whether the user prefers English-only programs.

regionPreference.description: The user's preferred region for studying.

desiredStartDate.description: The user's desired start date for their studies.

scholarshipInterest.description: Whether the user is interested in scholarships.

studyMode.description: The user's preferred study mode (On-campus, Hybrid, Online).

priorityFactors.description: Factors the user prioritizes when choosing a university.

profileUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp of when the user's profile was last updated.

University.title: University
University.description: Represents a university with its details and programs.

id.description: Unique identifier for the University entity.

country.description: The country where the university is located.

annualCost.description: The estimated annual cost of attending the university.

programHighlights.description: Highlights of the programs offered by the university.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Accessible only by the authenticated user with matching userId, or by an admin.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores university data. Read access is generally public. Write access is restricted.

params.name: universityId
params.description: The unique identifier of the university.
